segments.text: I really hate to say this , but don't go away mad , just go away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I knew this would happen some day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then , why didn't you try to prevent it in the beginning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . It's not all my fault , Anna . You are responsible , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want to argue anymore . Please get out of my life !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think we can still talk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No way ! Please don't follow me around .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Talk it easy , Anna . You really don't hate me . do you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do . Leave me alone !
segments.speaker: S1
